mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEMBERS a LEFT JOIN BREED b ON a.MEM_BR_IDX = b.BR_IDX LEFT JOIN PHOTO c ON a.MEM_ID = c.PH_MEM_ID and c.PH_DEL_GB = 'N' WHERE a.MEM_ID = #{MEM_ID}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBERS SET MEM_CALL = #{MEM_CALL}, MEM_ADDR = #{MEM_ADDR}, MEM_POSTCODE = #{postcode}, MEM_MIDDLEADDR = #{address}, MEM_DETAILADDR = #{detailAddress}, MEM_BR_IDX = #{KINDOFDOG}, MEM_DOG_NAME = #{MEM_DOG_NAME}, MEM_BR_NAME = #{MEM_BR_NAME}, MEM_DOG_NUM = #{MEM_DOG_NUM}, MEM_DOG_WEIGHT = #{MEM_DOG_WEIGHT}, MEM_DOG_ETC = #{MEM_DOG_ETC}, MEM_MOD_DATE = sysdate WHERE MEM_ID = #{MEM_ID}
